name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Lester FLETCHER, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Lester FLETCHER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of May, 2012, the Joint Motion for Remand for Re-Sentencing is GRANTED. This matter is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County for resentencing consistent with the parties’ agreement.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
43 A.3d 1289
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Lester FLETCHER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 11, 2012.
